instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Syne' font for all Headings (h1-h3) to give the artistic feel.
Use 'Plus Jakarta Sans' for all body text for maximum readability.
Implement the 'Tetris' grid for the landing page hero section.
Use the defined 'Primary Purple' (#2E0249) for branding but keep the main background clean white/off-white.
Use 'Glassmorphism' for the sticky header and floating action bars.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states defined in the 'components' section.
For the Artist Dashboard, use the 'High Density' grid layout.
For the Fan View, use a more spacious, card-based layout.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Do not apply universal transition (transition: all).
Do not center align the app container.
Use modern button styles (pill-shaped or sharp).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui.
